module floatingadd_TB();
  reg [31:0] a,b;
  wire [31:0] out;
  
floatadd uut(a,b,out);
  initial
    begin
    
    //0+0
    a=32'b00111111100000000000000000000000;
    b=32'b00111111100000000000000000000000;
    #100;
    //12.3245+5.598604 = 17.923104
    a=32'b01000001010001010011000100100111;
    b=32'b01000000101100110010011111000100;
    #100;
    //-24.23092+8.2039 = -16.02702
    a=32'b11000001110000011101100011101101;
    b=32'b01000001000000110100001100101101;
    #100;
    //0.0001+9.9999
    a=32'b00111000110100011011011100010111;
    b=32'b01000001000111111111111110010111;    
  end
endmodule
